solution.text:
Area of Polygon = Area of Triangle (1) + Area of Trapezium (2) + Area of Triangle (3) + Area of Triangle (4) + Area of Triangle (5)
\(= (\frac 12 \times a \times b) + (\frac 12 (b + e)(c + d)) + (\frac 12 \times e \times f) + (\frac 12 \times g \times (d+f)) + (\frac 12 \times (a+c) \times g)\)
\(= (\frac 12 \times _{{2*j}}_ \times _{{(2*j)+1}}_) + (\frac 12 \times _{{(2*j)+ 1 + (5*j*Decimal('0.5'))}}_ \times _{{2*j + 1 + j}}_) + (\frac 12 \times _{{5*j*Decimal('0.5')}}_ \times _{{3*j*Decimal('0.5')}}_) + (\frac 12 \times _{{2*j}}_ \times _{{j+(3*j*Decimal('0.5'))}}_) + (\frac 12 \times _{{(2*j)+(2*j)+1}}_ \times _{{2*j}}_)\)
\(= _{{Decimal('0.5')*(2*j)*(2*j + 1)}}_ + _{{Decimal('0.5')*((2*j)+ 1 + (5*j*Decimal('0.5')))*(3*j + 1)}}_ + _{{Decimal('0.5')*(5*j*Decimal('0.5'))*(3*j*Decimal('0.5'))}}_ + _{{j*(j+(3*j*Decimal('0.5')))}}_ + _{{j*(4*j + 1)}}_ \)
\(=_{{(Decimal('0.5')*(2*j)*(2*j + 1)) + (Decimal('0.5')*((2*j)+ 1 + (5*j*Decimal('0.5')))*(3*j + 1)) + (Decimal('0.5')*(5*j*Decimal('0.5'))*(3*j*Decimal('0.5'))) + (j*(j+(3*j*Decimal('0.5')))) + (j*(4*j + 1))}}_ cm^2\)
